meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, L1FN Auditorium and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the minutes for the November 12, 2024 Meeting
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes for the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Consider and Adopt an Inducement Resolution
agenda_items.description: Declaring intent to issue bonds, in an aggregate principal amount not to exceed $42,000,000, for a loan to LDG The Heights at UNT Station, LP to provide financing for a multifamily residential development for persons of low and moderate income.

agenda_items.title: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s 2024 Annual Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the annual report.

agenda_items.title: Review and discussion of Notice of Funding Availability application
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of application from Greenleaf Ventures LLC and Builders of Hope Community Development Corporation.

agenda_items.title: Review and discussion of DHFC Treasurer’s report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Treasurer’s report for the eleven-month period ending on November 30, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the pipeline report as of December 5, 2024.

financial_items.description: Loan to LDG The Heights at UNT Station, LP
